snippet: Despite the region’s dangers, the Baalbek International Festival’s organizers preserve this symbol of Lebanon’s openness.
abstract: Organizers of Baalbek International Festival, annual musical celebration in Baalbek, Lebanon, are seeking to preserve this symbol of Lebanon's openness and cultural richness despite war in neighboring Syria; have made decision to relocate but not cancel event, moving it from area near Syrian border to silk factory on outskirts of Beirut.
lead_paragraph: Despite the region’s dangers, the Baalbek International Festival’s organizers preserve this symbol of Lebanon’s openness.

headline.main: Amid Turmoil, Lebanese Music Festival Presses On
headline.print_headline:
Lebanese Festival Presses On,
Defying the Region’s Turmoil

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
